fin à l'emploi de l'employé, sans donner de raisons et sans avis ou cause.
b.) Après la fin de la période probatoire, l'Employeur peut décider de confirmer le
l'emploi de l'employé, à sa seule discrétion.
C.) La nourriture et l'hébergement seront fournis par la société.
4. Rémunération
Sous réserve des dispositions suivantes de la présente convention, pendant la période d'emploi,
l'employé sera rémunéré pour ses services comme suit :
a.) L'employé recevra un salaire annuel, payable mensuellement, selon la convenance de
l'Employeur, un montant de 24,600 euros par an ou 2,050 euros cumulés mensuellement,
sous réserve de telles augmentations de temps à autre, telles que déterminées par l'Employeur. De
tels paiements sera assujetti aux retenues statutaires normales de la part de l'Employeur.
b.) During the term of this Agreement, the Employee's salary shall be paid by means of bank
transfer, cheque, or any other method convenient to the Employer, and consented to by the
trans:
trial (« Trial period ») during which the Employer can, at his sole discretion, put
an end to the employee's job, without giving reasons and without notice or cause.
b.) After the end of the probation period, the Employer can decide to confirm the
employee's contract, at his sole discretion.
C.) Food and accommodation will be provided by the company.
4. Remuneration
Subject to the following provisions of the present agreement, during the period of employment,
the employee will be paid for his services as follows :
a.) The employee will receive an annual salary, payable on a monthly basis, at the convenance of
the Employer, an amount of 24,600 euros a year or 2,050 euros accumulated monthly,
subject to such increases from time to time, as determined by the Employer.
Such payments will be subject to normal statutory deductions from the Employer.
b.) During the term of this Agreement, the Employee's salary shall be paid by means of bank
